text:
Ahaha it’s always like that when you have a long break :P just gotta get back into the rhythm :’) Mother duck should lead the way :P saw that on Facebook today :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

The essay brief requires that we write a statistical report surrounding the animation industry so I thought it would be eye opening to write about how Japanese animators are often underpaid for their work. It’s sad really :( it’s honestly criminal how much they get paid. While I know animators are notorious for having wages down the lower end, animators in Japan are on a completely different wage level... almost comparable to modern day slavery really.
